Title: Chaplin
Writer: Anindya Bandopadhyay (dialogue), Anindya Bandopadhyay (screenplay), Annapurna Basu (subtitles), Padmanabha Dasgupta (dialogue), Padmanabha Dasgupta (story and screenplay), Srijato (lyrics)
Actors: Rudranil Ghosh, Soham Maitra, Srijit Mukherji, Mir Afsar Ali
Plot: Bangshi Das is an impersonator of Charlie Chaplin. He earns peanuts by being the 'joker' at birthday parties. However, he prefers to call himself an actor rather than a worker. His life ...
